name: Moringa Plant Based Superfood
description:
ATTN: International Orders Please see Terms & Conditions for information regarding shipping. 



This is Nutritional, Sustainable Super Food that:
 
Boost energy levels
 Improves digestive function
 Improves mental clarity/focus
 Promotes sound sleep
 Provides all vital vitamins
 Contains several important minerals
 Is an extremely powerful free radical fighter
 Moringa has very high levels of fibers
 Cleanses and Detoxifies the body of infectious toxins
 Strengthens your immune system 
Fights cancerous cells
 Slows down the aging process
 Promotes healthier and younger-looking skin
 Alleviates diabetes
 Normalizes and regulates cholesterol levels
 Helps maintain healthy heart function
 Minimizes inflammation
 Improves Blood Circulation
 Prevents artherosclerosis
 Enhances visual acuity
 Helps stabilize normal blood sugar levels
 Helps improve patients suffering from leukemia, dengue
 Fights general depression and stress
 Supports weight loss
 Improves upon your overall physical strength
 
TEA 
 

What makes our Moringa tea so healthy and delicious? The fact that it’s not a tea, but a tisane. Unlike teas, Moringa contains no caffeine and can be enjoyed by all. Also 25 individually wrapped tea bags are sealed for freshness and do not have a string tag or staple. Moringa herbal tea contain all nine essential amino acids and an abundant dosage of anti-oxidants. 

LEAF POWDER 
 
The powdered leaf of the Moringa plant is rich in protein (contains all essential amino acids) plus antioxidants as well as highly concentrated with calcium, chlorophyll, iron, Vitamin K, fiber, vitamin B-12, vitamin B-6 and trace minerals. Whats great about the Moringa Leaf Powder is that you can add it to any food without it changing the taste of the food. Add it to your soups, salads, juices, smoothies, cereals, baby food and also add it to your baking recipes.
 
CAPSULE 
 
Each of our capsules contains only the powdered leaves of the Moringa oleifera plant, and never contain additives, fillers or flow agents. They are specially nurtured and hand harvested and are then packaged at cGMP, FDA-approved facilities in the USA, handpicked, and packaged under close supervision. 

Moringa capsules provide an easily digestible abundance of nutrition, that is safe for the entire family to consume.

OIL

Pure moringa oil from nature's Miracle Tree is an ideal all-natural moisturizer for dry skin. This healing, topical treatment offers relief from sunburn and makes a perfect non-sticky massage oil. Moringa oil extracted from the seeds of the Moringa oleifera tree has been used in skin preparations and ointments since Egyptian times and is among the cosmetic industries most desired oils in the formulation of skin care products and cosmetics, chosen for its many antioxidants and documented skin-rejuvenating properties. In addition, many health and beauty experts consider Moringa oil the primary secret behind the healthy and radiant skin seen in Asia and Africa.

With an incredible oleic acid content of more than 70%, moringa oil penetrates deep beneath the top layer allowing it to deliver vital nutrients to your aging skin. Moringa oil is rich in vitamin A , vitamin C, minerals, fatty acids, oleic (Omega 9) and behenic acids that allow it to be easily absorbed into your skin without feeling greasy and ensures your skin receives the food that it needs to repair and sustain itself.

Moringa oil can also be massaged into the hair and scalp delivering rejuvenating vitamins and minerals to the follicles of the hair and tissue of the scalp. The use of moringa oil on the hair and scalp can help reduce split ends and dandruff.

name: C.K.L.S
description:
It has been said that all sickness begins in the colon and spreads to other parts of the body. Dr Goss's New Body Herbal Formula CKLS was created to eliminate and stop all problems of the colon, kidneys, liver, spleen and other organs that build-up toxin. CKLS will not gripe the stomach like other body cleaners you may have tried in the past. CKLS could eliminate stress, sluggishness headaches, mucus buildups tiredness, worms,, colon pockets, harmful bacteria, and constipation. CKLS helps to rebuild the mucus lining and heal the intestine.

Ingredients: Aloe Vera Resin, Chamomile, Cascara Sagrada, Chaparral, Mullein, Uva Ursi, Fenugreek, Cayenne, Dandelion, Eucalyptus

Each bottle contains 100 Capsules. This product contains no fillers, binders or other additives, soy-free, dairy-free and gluten free. Each capsule is a Vegicap®, a 100% vegetarian capsule.

Start off with taking two per day. If that doesn't create a bowel movement than increase by one capsule until desired results are reached. CKLS can be taken daily if needed. The goal is to increase the amount of fresh fruits, veggies, & water in the diet and that will create an inventory for regularity.


*Do not take during pregnancy.
*Disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA and are not intended to diagnose, cure, treat or prevent disease. Individual results may vary, and before using any supplements, it is always advisable to consult with your own health care provider.

name: Incense Sticks
description:
Yamuna- Goddess of purification

Qualities: Absorption in spiritual truth, purification, joy of the divine playfulness.  

Scent: This rich combination of Vanilla, Copal & Amber brings to mind the feelings of cleanliness, purity, freshness and innocence.  Vanilla is sweet, Copal is cleansing and Amber is pure and playful. Its fragrance will change the mood of your whole day.

Contents: 10 Hand Rolled Sticks made with Love 


Ramakrishnananda’s hand rolled incense sticks are made from the finest natural ingredients in the world, from a variety of herbs, flowers and resins which are blended together with pure oils and pure sandalwood. These exquisite blends are formulated to create a soothing and balanced environment, where relaxation of the body, mind and spirit can occur. These unique Ayurvedic blends are made according to ancient recipes and their scent lingers for hours after burning (without the burnt scent/smell like some others). This ancient incense manufacturing method is known as Masala, which means spice, and has its origin in India. 

How its made:
Its process includes the crushing of a variety of herbs, gums and resins such as copal and amber, aromatic woods such as cedar and sandalwood and of many different spices. All of the ingredients are crushed into a powder and mixed with pure oils and a natural gum binding powder, and are then transformed into a paste. The paste is traditionally rolled by hand on a bamboo stick. These aromas carry a secret of an ancient wisdom; a secret that is known to many of the spiritual cultures of the world such as the Shaman, Vedic, Celtic, Buddhist, Native American and others.


After lighting a handmade stick of our incense, sit to meditate, practice yoga, read a book or simply… be….

name: Monoi Oil
description:
Light weight non-greasy moisturizer that nourishes the skin and hair. 

Scent: Sensual gardenia flowers mixed with coconut. Soft & silky  texture. Clean unisex scent. 

Monoï is a Tahitian word meaning "sacred scented oil". It is made by the locals of Tahiti and French Polynesian islands. It is created through an ancient method called enfleurage wherein Tahiti’s national flower, Taire  (Gardenia Tahitensis), is macerated along with Tahitian coconut oil to pull out its fragrance and essences. 

Ingredients: This authentic Monoi oil is a blend of pure Tahitian coconut oil scented with fresh Tiare (Gardenia Tahitensis) flowers. 

No emulsifiers or preservatives are added to this precious blend nor is it tested on animals.

Monoi oil is completely safe for anyone to use. Many Tahitian mothers even rub it on their babies every morning and evening. There is no risk for allergies and the oil will not cause a skin reaction.

Other Benefits:

* Natural barrier against dehydration
* Protects, regenerates & improves the quality of the hair fibers
* Long-lasting moisturization 
* Natural antiseptic to prevent or soothe mosquito bites
* Makes hair more soft, silky and shiny
* As a hot oil treatment, it helps repair and deep condition the hair to a healthy shine.
* Sun protectant (before or after sun care) 
* Massage oil
* Relaxing bath oil

Monoi oil becomes solid at a certain temperature. Below24°/75°F, run hot tap water over the bottle and the oil liquifies again. 

Our Monoi oil is much more than a skin and hair preparation. It has also the power to stimulate the senses.

4oz.

name: Hair Growth Infusions
description:
**PLEASE READ BEFORE ORDERING**
ATTN: International Orders Please see Terms & Conditions for information regarding shipping. 


Nutritive and medicinal herbs infused in organic oils that are carefully chosen to work synergistically with each other to enhance and promote hair health and growth 

Choose option from the drop down menu below.

Directions: Massage oil into scalp and hair as needed. Works great as a hot oil or deep conditioning treatment.

Contains the following:

Rosemary-stimulates hair growth, disinfects scalp.

Ginger-blood circulation enhancer stimulating hair follicles to encourage thicker healthier hair growth.

Lavender- stimulates hair growth, helps relieve itching and helps with dandruff. 

Peppermint-stimulating, antiseptic, refreshing and cooling properties

Horsetail- rich in Silica, which helps form the collagen in skin and   helps to strengthen hair. It also keeps hair looking smooth and shiny. The potassium, manganese and selenium may also encourage hair growth.

Nettle- prevents loss of hair and may also promote new growth where hair has become weakened. The regenerating effect of this herb in the scalp had the ability to combat dandruff, seborrhea and other disorders related to hair loss. 

Burdock Root- improves hair growth, prevents hair shedding/loss,  while adding sheen, and strength to the hair.

Dandelion-provides iron and helps maintain the health of your hair

Oatstraw- high in silica, emollient qualities that can benefit your hair health.

Lemon Balm- treats hair loss and alopecia, soothes scalp skin and act as an anti-inflammatory and nourishes hair.

Jamaican Black Castor Oil- strengthens the hair roots and promote hair growth. Treats infections that causes various scalp problems and lead to hair loss.

Olive Oil- the presence of antioxidants in olive oil makes it an appropriate hair oil that promotes overall scalp health. Natural conditioner, antifungal and antibacterial properties.

Moringa Oil- contains thiocyanate which has high affinity to the hair bulbs and prevents falling hair. It strengthens the immune system, and restores scalp condition.

Coconut oil-stimulates hair follicles to promote hair growth. It controls dandruff, moisturizes scalp, and brings out healthy hair.


TEA INFUSION (LOOSE DRIED HERBS)

All the herbs from the hair growth elixir for you to use in your own infusion. Herbs include: Rosemary, Ginger, Lavender, Peppermint, Horsetail, Nettle, Burdock Root, Dandelion, Oat straw, Lemon Balm, & Moringa

■ Drink as a tea. 

Pour 8 oz. freshly boiled water over one teaspoon of herbs. Cover cup and steep 10-15 minutes. Use a tea ball, strainer cup or mesh to separate herbs from tea before drinking.

■Hair Rinse

Pour 2 cups of freshly boiled water over 3-4 tablespoons of herbs. Cover and steep until temperature is warm. 
When the tea is warm, strain and separate herbs from the water and apply to scalp and hair. As you slowly pour the tea over your wet head, massage the infusion into your hair and scalp. Keep a large bowl under your head to catch the liquid and reapply several times. Gently rinse it out with cool water or, for extra conditioning benefits, just leave it in and towel dry hair.

■Make your own oil infusion

Place 2 tablespoons of herbs in a clean glass jar.
Add enough oil (oil of choice) to cover the herb. Wait for an hour or two for the oil to be absorbed, and add more as needed until the herb is completely covered.
Tightly cap and shake.
Place the jar in a paper bag to protect from light, and place in a sunny window. Allow to infuse for several days, shaking frequently. 
Strain out the herbs and bottle


Choose option from the drop down menu below.

name: African Black Soap Beauty
description:
**PLEASE READ BEFORE ORDERING**
ATTN: International Orders Please see Terms & Conditions for information regarding shipping. 



African Black Soap is an all-natural soap hand-crafted in Western Africa. There are more than 100 different varieties of African Black Soap. The blackness is attributed to the nature and color of the soap derived from the burning and boiling of various components put together to form a homogeneous soap to be used daily. The production and recipe for the soap varies depending on the region of Africa that it is made. It is most commonly hand-crafted by village women in Africa who make the soap for themselves and to support their families. 

This Holistic cleanser is 100% effective; it is all natural & effective for cleaning the entire body including the face and hair. For centuries, Ghanaians and Nigerians have used black soap to help relieve many skin issues. It regenerates the skin, releases build-up from the pores that causes pimples and rashes. Many swear by it for skin irritations and conditions such as eczema and psoriasis. African Black Soap contains a high amount of glycerin, which absorbs moisture from the air and literally deposits it into the skin, making the skin soft and supple. It is also used as a shampoo for the hair. African Black Soap has a natural source of vitamins A & E and iron. This helps to strengthen the scalp and hair. 

■100% Natural & Organic African Black Soap 
■Relieves Acne & Blemishes 
■Known to aid skin irritations such as Eczema and Psoriasis. 
■Great for Washing Skin & Hair! 
■Rich source of iron and vitamins A and E for your skin. 
■Great for lightening dark spots, discolored underarms

Black Soap Beauty Liquid contains the following:
 
* Distilled Water
* Bark of the Shea butter tree
* Leaves of palm tree
* Leaves of banana tree
* Pods of coco plant
* Leaves of plantain plant
* Shea nuts
* Shea Oil
* Coconut Oil
* Palm Flowers
* Palm Kernels



Skin color doesn't matter, Black Soap is for deep cleansing. Beauty is not defined but shape, size or color.

Choose option below

Bar 
Liquid (great for sensitive skin types)

name: Oatmeal Facial Cleansing Scrub
description:
**PLEASE READ BEFORE ORDERING**
ATTN: International Orders Please see Terms & Conditions for information regarding shipping. 



Oatmeal contains 18 different amino acids, which are essential to healthy skin. Amino acids act as building blocks for the body, helping to rebuild tissue and promote healing. Your face can absorb amino acids from the oatmeal in this scrub to help heal blemishes, smooth skin without irritation and repair damaged skin. 

Our Oatmeal Facial Scrub  has skin-soothing properties and is hypoallergenic. The granular texture of our scrub is safe for even the most sensitive skin types. It cleanses your skin without irritating or drying it out. In addition it helps relieve any dryness, soaks up excess oil associated with acne and removes dead skin cells to make way for fresh healthy ones. Extra moisture is provided by the ingredients in our formula to promotes vibrant and healthy younger-looking skin.

This lathering scrub is made with oats and very fine sifted coral sand from the beautiful beaches of Barbados along with fresh herbs and pure essential oils. Free from any sodium laurel sulfates, parabens and other harsh chemicals. Mild clean scent.

How To Use: Moisten and apply scrub all over face, avoiding eye and lip areas. Gently massage in circular motion with wet fingertips, Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Follow with our Whipped Facial Butter cream for optimal results. 

Skin Types: Normal to Oily, Acne prone & Sensitive Skin

Ingredients: Natural Soap, Water, Glycerine, Soya Oil, Coarse ground Oats, Caribbean Sand, Essential Oils.

2oz

name: Organic Body Polish
description:
Create a spa experience at home with our Organic Body Polish! 

Skin is the body’s outermost point of defense, and as such it is often exposed to harsh environmental conditions including sunlight, extreme cold, dirt, and sweat. The skin constantly regenerates, but dead skin cells typically sit on this top layer until they either fall off naturally, or are removed. Exfoliating using our Organic Body Polish can improve the skin’s health and overall condition.

Benefits

Cellulite Minimizer

Turbinado Sugar retains the mineral and vitamins present in sugarcane juice, and also includes phosphorus, calcium, magnesium, potassium and iron. 

Natural humectants that help hydrate your skin and keep moisture within. 

Natural source of glycolic acid, an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that penetrates the skin and breaks down the "glue" that bonds skin cells, encouraging cell turnover and generating fresher, younger-looking skin.

Ingredients: Organic Raw Turbinado Cane Sugar, Organic Coconut oil, Unrefined Shea Butter,  Natural Soap, Vanilla & Love

Scent: Coconut Vanilla Cookie


Directions 
Use in shower, bath or spa treatment. After cleansing the skin, scoop between fingers, apply to wet skin and gently massage in a circular motion, focusing on rough areas. Rinse thoroughly and pat dry.


Do not exfoliate if skin is sunburned or irritated for any reason. Be careful not to fall on wet or slippery areas caused by using the scrub. Avoid using body polishes on the face. Please see our oatmeal scrub for facial usage. 


6oz Recyclable & Reusable Glass Jar

name: Facial Butter Cream
description:
**PLEASE READ BEFORE ORDERING**
ATTN: International Orders Please see Terms & Conditions for information regarding shipping. 


Fragrance-free, botanical based skin care products to enhance the health & appearance of your skin

Our All Natural Handmade Facial Butter Cream leaves your face feeling luxurious with a silky smooth texture that melts into your skin, creating an intensive moisturizing treat to your skin.
 
This cream is very concentrated, so a little goes a long way. It melts on contact with your skin and is easily absorbed leaving your skin feeling soft & supple. It is great for sun exposed skin as it contains Mango Butter which has protective effects on UV rays and helps soothe sunburns in the summer and a necessity in winter since it provides the moisture that the cold months and indoor heating take away. 

Mango Butter - contains a wealth of healthy properties with multiple skin-nourishing benefits that can really do your wonders for your skin.  While its semi-solid, non-greasy, creamy-soft texture is appealing, it also works quickly to soothe and quench dry skin.  

For centuries, Mango Butter has been traditionally used in the rain forests and tropics for its skin softening, soothing, moisturizing and protective properties. (The mango tree is a tropical evergreen and the nourishing butter is cold-pressed from the de-shelled fruit kernels of fresh mangoes).

The powerful antioxidants, vitamins and minerals contained in Mango Butter, allow the skin to rejuvenate and protect it’s self from the elements.  Mango butter, with it’s healing properties, can be a natural remedy for many skin conditions.

    Effectively treats dry skin

    Restores elasticity 
   
    Reduces the degeneration of skin cells

    Skin rash and irritation

    Helps to quickly heal blemishes

    Relieves itching skin

    Reduces inflammation and redness

    Treats small skin wounds and skin cracks

    Moisturizes and soothes tough or rough skin

    Relieves insect bites

    Promotes healthy rejuvenated skin

    Improves muscle fatigue, aches and tension

    Relieves skin allergies such as poison ivy or poison oak

    Treats eczema, psoriasis and dermatitis and other skin conditions 


Ingredients: Contains the super moisturizing properties of Unrefined Mango Butter, certified organic oils, Purified Water, Vegetable Glycerin, & Natural Preservatives
 

Dry Skin types. Works as a perfect night cream as well!

All products are made to order. **FRESH ** NATURAL ** **VEGAN** HANDMADE** 
 
2oz.

name: Nilotica Shea Butter (East African)
description:
**PLEASE READ BEFORE ORDERING**
ATTN: International Orders Please see Terms & Conditions for information regarding shipping. Due to its extreme delicacy and low melting point, East African Shea Butter only ships from September thru May.



We are excited to introduce certified organic premium Nilotica Shea Butter. This nut butter comes from the Vitellaria Nilotica tree, a sub species which grows in Northern Uganda and Southern Sudan (Eastern Africa). All pure, unrefined shea butters has remarkable moisturizing and healing properties, but  the East African Nilotica Shea Butter is higher in olein (the liquid part of the Shea Butter), which makes it much softer and smoother in consistency and more applicable to the skin than conventional shea butters.

Nilotica shea butter is a unique and precious botanical substance, a blend of natural compounds with unparalleled healing and moisturizing effects on the skin. It leaves the skin feeling soft and well-moisturized yet not greasy. Nilotica shea butter makes a great lip balm and all over body moisturizer. Also effective in treating general dermatitis, rosecea, eczema, dry-skin redness, dry scalp, diaper rash, insect bites, chapping sunburn, frost bite, stretch mark prevention and for minimizing scarring.

•All purpose superb moisturizer for the skin, lips & hair
•Rich in olien (oils) and vitamins A, E & F
•Certified organic by IMO, meeting USDA and European      standards.
•Almost odorless with a slight sweet nutty aroma
•Creamy non-greasy texture
•Melts at skin temperature making it super absorbing
•High in unsaponifiables, antioxidant, and cinnamic acid
•Forms a natural barrier
•Cold pressed preserving all of the natural goodness
•No chemical extraction
•100% pure and natural- no additives or fragrance added

Experience the Shea Nilotica difference

Choose sizes below

name: Lip Butter
description:
A luxurious blend of organic oils and plant butters to hydrate, heal, nourish & condition lips.  Hand whipped with all natural & edible ingredients with the added benefit of sunscreen to protect & vitamins/minerals to heal. 

Unlike other lip products, this blend contains NO petroleum, preservatives, parabens, silicones, gluten, GMO’s, petrochemicals, phthalates, synthetic fragrances, flavors & dyes.
  
As with most of our handmade goodies, a little goes a long way. Use daily for healthy, soft & kissable lips! 

Ingredients: Coconut oil, Castor oil, Moringa, Organic Beeswax, Unrefined Shea Butter (Uganda) Vitamin E & Flavored with Organic Honey or Organic Essential Oils (food grade)

Benefits:

Shea Butter: Softens & natural sunscreen

Castor Oil: Highly emollient and contains ricinoleic acid which is known to prevent the growth of viruses and bacteria

Coconut Oil: Fatty acids creating a barrier to lock moisture in

Moringa: Rich in oleic and linoleic acids, and vitamins A and C. Highly emollient and rich in natural anti-oxidants, which decrease the need for preservatives.

Vitamin E: Antioxidant and protects your skin from damage directly caused by ultraviolet rays

Honey: has the power to moisturize and heal because honey has antibacterial powers, it helps prevent infection from developing in cracked lips. Honey also hydrates your dry lips to restore lost moisture.


**Vegan option available made without honey and with Candelilla wax instead of beeswax**

**All Certified Organic Ingredients**

name: Green Coconut Smoothie
description:
**For external use only**

Feed your hair/skin this nutritious treat packed with antioxidants vitamins, minerals and all the benefits of a green smoothie. 

Contains the amazing properties of Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Moringa, Sweet Almond, Matcha Green Tea, Horsetail, Vitamin E, Fragrance & Love.

Some Benefits include:

Green tea contains polyphenol compounds which prevents premature aging of skin cells. When applied topically to the skin green tea is extremely effective against safe guarding the skin against sunburn, soothes inflammation including eczema, psoriasis, rosacea and also has anti-cellulite and anti-irritancy properties. Green tea contains vitamin C, vitamin E and panthenol (provitamin), which restores dry or damaged hair, strengthens, softens and prevents split ends. Studies have shown that the antioxidants (EGCG) in green tea stimulate hair growth.  

Moringa contains all the essential amino acids which mean it’s an effective anti-ager for hair and skin. It contains thiocyanate which has high affinity to the hair bulbs and prevents falling hair. It strengthens the immune system, and restores scalp condition.  Moringa contains vitamins A, C and E which builds collagen fibers and minimizes the appearance of fine wrinkle lines. It is also a natural healing emollient which helps with dry, rough skin conditions like eczema, psoriasis and dermatitis.

Horsetail is rich in silica. The silica content helps strengthen weak, brittle, damaged hair, giving it vitality and promoting hair growth. There is a high mineral level as well including potassium, selenium and manganese. The saponins and flavonoids it contains help the skin regenerate, improving elasticity of skin.

name: Chrysoprase
description:
Handmade with Love

Semi-Precious Gemstone Beaded Bracelet.

Can be worn alone or stacked with your other favorite wrist candies. Please note if your wrist is small, medium or large (6,7 or 8)

Price listed for 1 bracelet. Choose from option in the drop down menu. Contact us with any special requests. 

Buddha: symbol of enlightenment, compassion, wisdom, charity, peace. The word Buddha comes from the Sanskrit root ‘budh’, meaning to awaken. Buddhas are those who have awakened to the true nature of things as taught in the Four Noble Truths.

Chrysoprase is cryptocrystalline, which means that it is composed of crystals so fine that they cannot be seen as distinct particles under normal magnification.

Chrysoprase helps to make conscious what is currently unconscious. It's vibrations have a tranquilizing effect that seem to bring damaging subconscious thought to the foreground, where they can be assessed and dealt with properly.

Chrysoprase has been credited with a number of other powers, such as banishing greed, selfishness, carelessness, stirring the imagination. calming irritability and the pains of gout. It has been said to create happiness, enterprise, prudence adaptability, versatility, action, progress and adventure. Told to protect from evil dreams and demons, to bring success in new enterprises, and to make the wearer more cheerful.

Healing Properties:
Chrysoprase's healing powers include strengthening the eyes, staunching the blood and relieving the pain of rheumatism.

Chakra Classification:
Chrysoprase has a calming effect, it will open, activate and energize the4th, or Heart Chakra.

Many people who are drawn to this stone have all the courage they need, but often time have difficulty recognizing it. Chrysoprase allows one to tap into their inner strength and courage and then to use it wisely.

Meditating or wearing this stone may facilitate a deep heart connection with Mother Earth, some like to use it for manifestation of abundance, harmony and contentment
